alert.note: Alert for Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Hardee; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 1:31PM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Hardee, Manatee, Polk, southeastern Hillsborough and northwestern Sarasota Counties through 230 PM EST... At 130 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Celebration to 11 miles southeast of Fish Hawk to 15 miles west of Saint Armands Key. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Sarasota, Bradenton, Winter Haven, Haines City, Bartow, Lake Wales, Auburndale, Palmetto, Wauchula, South Gate Ridge, Lake Sarasota, Saint Armands Key, North Sarasota, Memphis, West Samoset, Southgate, Gulf Gate Estates, The Meadows and Parrish. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EST for central and west central Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Hardee; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota; Polk
